title: The Wailers - Dub Marley - 2002 - FLAC
description:
<a href="http://veryrare.org" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://veryrare.org</a>

Liner Notes:

The Rastaman Vibration sessions took place mostly at Harry Johnson's Harry J Studio. During breaks and between sessions, The Wailers band and guitarist Lloyd "Guitsy" Willis recorded 10 of Bob's hits. Each song was dubbed and Guitsy remembers the 20 cuts were released on a very limited scale in Jamaica in 1976.

Drums: Carlton Barrett
Bass: Aston Barrett
Keyboards: Tyrone Downie
Guitar: Lloyd :Guitsy"" Willis
Percussion: Alvin Patterson, Aston Barrett
Recorded & Mixed at Harry J by Sylvan Morris, Produced by Lloyd Willis, Mastered by Jean Pierre Bouquet, Art Work: Jean Louis Caron, Photographs: Laurent Gudin
Special Thanks: C+J+J, Lloyd Willis, Sly Dunbar, Robbie Shakespeare
